currentConfiguration: A policy from which all other policies can inherit. Only the most general settings should be applied to this policy as they will apply to all policies that inherit from it, unless overridden. More specific settings and rules should be added to sub-policies that are assigned to computers.

trendRecommendedConfiguration: Block unrecognized software until it is explicitly allowed
currentConfiguration: Allow unrecognized software until it is explicitly blocked
